citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:15am on
October 16, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors. An employee answered at
the facility and informed the inspector that the licensees were not present and would not be available for several hours.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:15am on 
October 16, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors. An employee answered at 
the facility and informed the inspector that the licensees were not present and would not be available for several hours. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
